description: Amendments to planning permission dated 27th August 2020 (RN 20/03950/FULL) for the Reinstatement and enlargement of central courtyard at lower ground floor and ground floor level, creation of a balcony at ground floor level fronting onto central courtyard, installation of plant within the front pavement vaults and central courtyard, new metal balustrade at ground floor level, and associated external and internal refurbishment works; all to enlarge the existing ground and lower ground floor duplex apartment (Class C3). NAMELY, to amend the description of the proposal to 'Reinstatement and enlargement of central courtyard at lower ground floor and ground floor level, creation of a balcony at ground floor level fronting onto central courtyard, installation of plant at lower ground floor level, new metal balustrade at ground floor level, and associated external and internal refurbishment works; all to enlarge the existing ground and lower ground floor duplex apartment (Class C3)', to incorporated additional area at lower ground floor level in the demise of the apartment and associated internal alterations, omit some of the approved plant and alterations to the rear courtyard facades.
